Title: Holiday: A Soldier is Never Off Duty
Writer: A.R. Murugadoss (screenplay), A.R. Murugadoss (story), Arun Shekhar (adaptation)
Actors: Akshay Kumar, Sonakshi Sinha, Freddy Daruwala, Sumeet Raghvan
Plot: A military officer uses his intellect and fighting skills to hunt and knock down a terrorist aiming to rip apart Mumbai via the sleeper cells under his command.
